import React from 'react'; import client1 from './images/brand1.jpg'; import client2 from './images/brand2.png'; import client4 from './images/brand3.png'; import client5 from './images/brand4.jpg'; import client6 from './images/brand5.png'; import client7 from './images/brand6.jpg'; import client8 from './images/brand7.png'; import client9 from './images/brand9.png'; import client10 from './images/brand10.png'; import client11 from './images/brand11.png'; import client12 from './images/brand12.jpg'; import client13 from './images/brand15.png'; import client14 from './images/brand16.png'; import aboutimg from './images/aboutus.png'; const About = () => { const styles = { container: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', height: '100vh', backgroundImage: `url(${aboutimg})`, backgroundSize: 'cover', }, heading: { textAlign: 'center', color: '#fff', fontSize: '32px', fontWeight: 'bold', textShadow: '2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)', marginTop: '-70vh', }, }; return ( <>

About Us

{/* clients */}

Our Clients

{/* service */}

Services We Provide

Design and Printing

Great design and print company have two specific goals – to communicate and promote. Excellence requires complete mastery of design print craft and expertise in typography, layout, and photography. We specialize in designing and developing all types of marketing materials like corporate profiles, brochures, newsletters, flyers, insertions, annual reports, leaflets, POP materials, posters, direct mailers, hoardings and so much more.

Digital Marketing

We aim to show a resistless public presentation to the multitude that adds to the brand value of our loved clients. Our goal is to get straight to the point and cutting out everything that’s not required and coming directly to the marked communication but through a fascinating way to keep the viewers/readers/listeners focused. It is required in making an ennobling motion and striking the world, which is why a perfect digital media platform is in vast demand. We work for your success to make a better tomorrow for all. Digital marketing- A digital marketing manager is responsible for developing, implementing and managing marketing campaigns promoting a company and its products and/or services. Brand awareness within the digital space as well as driving website traffic and acquiring leads/customers would thus also be enhanced, Influential marketing-focusing on individuals who have influence over potential buyers, and accelerates marketing activities around these influencers. Influential marketing impacts the market every day. Social media reach- a hike in likes and followers in all social media handles including Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and more for more branding and brand awareness. Promotional creatives- promotion of creatives of products and/or services offered and generating maximum leads in the process. Business creation through digital media- With the growth that digital media has seen, big advertising networks are hungry for inorganic growth and hence maximum business creation and lead generation are done via digital marketing promotions. Creating SEO, traffic increasing for company and website- A must for successful marketing for online retailers is the search engine optimization (SEO), that ranks a website based on “signals” that the site emits and also increasing the site reach among masses and thus creating a rush in traffic for the website. Connecting fan base through a digital platform- a strong and loyal fan base for a product or a service is created via the digital platform as it is followed by those who ardently wishes to follow and get updates about the product. Digital media are a perfect platform to connect with the base to provide them with product details and changes incorporated. SMS and email marketing- This is used thoughtfully to build loyalty and trust for the brand. Email marketing and marketing via SMS is important for building relationships with prospects, leads, current customers, and even past customers because it provides a chance to speak directly to them, in their inbox, at a time that is convenient for them.

Brand Managment

We expertise and primary focus to ensure strategic clarity, build brand image, shape culture and attain sustainable market growth and competitive advantage. Corporate identity-This deals with branding through collaterals. Thus the sole purpose is to bring the brand name under public limelight. Visual guidelines – strategies and guidelines for the best management policies to be set which clearly states about what is to be done, how it is to be done, and why it needs to be done. Brand management-Brand management is the development of brand perception in the market. It is an important aspect of marketing, which utilizes sophisticated techniques to boost the value of a product. Depending on the marketing strategy implemented, brand management can increase the price products and build devoted customers utilizing brand affirmations with images or key messaging. Competitive analysis- competitive analysis would determine the strengths and weaknesses of the competitors within the market, strategies that will provide a distinct advantage, the barriers that can be developed in order to prevent competition from entering the market, and any weaknesses that can be exploited Insight research- for maximum growth and to avoid mistakes, it’s essential to know as much as possible about the external environment and detect Any changes in the marketplace and hence in-sight researches are essential. Positioning and research- positioning is the consumer’s perception of a brand or product in relation to competing brands or products. Primarily, it is about the place a brand occupies in the mind of its target audience. It is thus essential for it communicates the products’ attributes to the target customers based on customer needs, competitive pressures, available communication channels and carefully crafted key messages.

Advertising

Advertisement, the root of all sales, product improvements and stabilizing the market value of a particular brand. Without advertising, brands would have a fewer audience, and the impact of the products would fall for backstage and thus, companies would incur massive loses if their products fail to create the mark. Thus Advertisement and Public Relations in creating, guiding and assisting a brand in its growth in the market scenario practically plays the most vital role. print media- Print media advertising using physically printed media, like magazines and newspapers, to make maximum consumers, business customers and prospects aware of the products. It deals with sets of loyal customers who are genuinely conscious to have knowledge about the product. electronic media-Electronic media being more flexible produces better ability to show product ads to a specific type of people who have access to electronic media. outdoor media- One of the best ways to reach clients, this drives up the company’s awareness and grabs client attention in the best possible way. •radio- it allows the product details to be delivered to a targeted and captive audience at a cost that is much lower than most advertising mediums. Most radio listeners have specific favorite radio stations they tune in to regularly and hence pinpoints product advertisement better than other media forms.

Exhibition and Events

To make the grand events more pompous, a 360 coverage is provided to our clients opting for B2B, B2C meet, corporate branding task, Flags Exhibitions and Events Division offering complete turnkey solutions. Events and conference- developing themed activity, occasion, display, or exhibit to promote a product or cause of the company. Trade meets and exhibitions- gala meets. Trade fair and exhibitions for promotions of products or cause.

Public Relations

In a porous world, where news and events race across time and space, media relations ultimately helping in building relationships with the audience is the golden key. The art of communication is deep-rooted which is why we work on a simple cycle of Triple I’s i.e., Inspiration, Innovation, and Initiation. With straightforward and crisp tactics, we develop and augment the reputation of our esteemed clients with extreme proficiency. The communication message of our clients is judiciously crafted by our experienced team of communication specialist supported with in-depth research and analysis. Equipped with major communication nodes across India through a strong network of associates we understand the passion and approach with integrated solutions. image building- An image is synthetic. It is planned: created especially to maintain the image of the organization and put up the best in front of our clients. Hence image building is vital for the public relation nurturing for growth of every organization. corporate communication- The main function under corporate communication is to connect with various public using mediums like press releases, social media, products, and events to facilitate the building and managing relationships. They are responsible for dealing with the company’s internal and external messages. With an aim to increase brand exposure through industry editors, media personnel, and journalists, they create, find, and develop innovative programs to maximize corporate profits and develop value-added concepts for brands. media briefing- Media briefing is an ongoing priority. Briefings are crucial and speaking with editors provides the opportunity to garner coverage and be seen as an industry leader and recognized in their space. Press releases and Conferences- A press conference is one of the most commonly used and potent tools to advance a cause and gain coverage in newspapers, magazines, blogs and on TV news broadcasts. Rather than setting up interviews with individual reporters, press releases and press conferences allow an entity to interact with a roomful of journalists all at once and this is an effective way to quickly disseminate public relation messages.

Web Designing

From the basic to advanced database sites, we promise to meet virtually every need of online communication. Web development- to deal with designing, coding and modifying websites, from layout to function and according to specifications set. Web designing – Area for production and maintenance of websites. The different areas of web design include web graphic design, interface design, authoring, user experience design; search engine optimization, navigation ergonomics, and website layout with colors, contrasts, fonts and imagery (photography) as well as icons design.

Marketing

The key to foster individuality lies in marketing. With the solemn believe that the best thing to do with the best things in life is passing them to others, Atraski serves a broad range of services to provide innovation at every step. Marketing strategy- The first step includes listening to our customers, and not our competitors. Setting the correct strategy helps to exceed the customer expectations by having a clear idea about them. Marketing consultation-The backbone to marketing strategy, consultation is to understand and analyze what motivates consumers and how to put strategies in place to improve business. Market survey research- Market research surveys are the most authentic way to gather information on the target markets or customers. It provides Brand Awareness, includes how recently consumers have engaged with our product, how often they do so, and their total spending in both the brand and product categories with also producing insight into our audience’s beliefs about our product and channeling the factors that may affect the intent to purchase
